entry.title: Dave Lamb narrates Waybuloo
entry.summary: I must have missed this. Back in January CBeebies apparently changed the format of Waybuloo to include a voiceover from Dave Lamb (of Big Barn Farm). It was so unpopular that the format was changed back the next day – easy to miss then! The single episode which was broadcast can now be found on YouTube…
entry.content:
I must have missed this. Back in January CBeebies apparently changed the format of Waybuloo to include a voiceover from Dave Lamb (of Big Barn Farm). It was so unpopular that the format was changed back the next day – easy to miss then!

The single episode which was broadcast can now be found on YouTube…
